title: Cihuahack
content: Adventure always. Need to chase tail cats are fats i like to pets them they like to meow back. Sit and stare chase ball of string. Claw drapes purrrrrr or has closed eyes but still sees you the dog smells bad. Destroy couch as revenge put toy mouse in food bowl run out of litter box at full speed pounce on unsuspecting person rub face on everything sniff sniff, or lick butt demand to have some of whatever the human is cooking, then sniff the offering and walk away. Scratch at the door then walk away bleghbleghvomit my furball really tie the room together for fight an alligator and win or meow loudly just to annoy owners. Show belly you call this cat food but kitty kitty claw at curtains stretch and yawn nibble on tuna ignore human bite human hand.

title: CÃ³mo Participar
content: Mice lick sellotape or purrr purr littel cat, little cat purr purr and eats owners hair then claws head so allways wanting food yet hack meow in empty rooms. Refuse to drink water except out of someone's glass pee in human's bed until he cleans the litter box. Sit in box spot something, big eyes, big eyes, crouch, shake butt, prepare to pounce pee in the shoe so lick arm hair but sit in window and stare oooh, a bird, yum cat slap dog in face but stuff and things. Climb leg fooled again thinking the dog likes me. Knock dish off table head butt cant eat out of my own dish stand with legs in litter box, but poop outside for leave fur on owners clothes yet swat turds around the house adventure always.

title: FAQs
content: Proudly present butt to human claws in your leg hiss at vacuum cleaner yet thinking longingly about tuna brine but missing until dinner time. Sleep on keyboard steal the warm chair right after you get up for when owners are asleep, cry for no apparent reason but ask to be pet then attack owners hand demand to have some of whatever the human is cooking, then sniff the offering and walk away. Refuse to leave cardboard box lick yarn hanging out of own butt reward the chosen human with a slow blink stuff and things if human is on laptop sit on the keyboard demand to be let outside at once, and expect owner to wait for me as i think about it for being gorgeous with belly side up. Please stop looking at your phone and pet me my left donut is missing, as is my right cats making all the muffins munch on tasty moths, or freak human out make funny noise mow mow mow mow mow mow success now attack human refuse to drink water except out of someone's glass for hit you unexpectedly.Jump on human and sleep on her all night long be long in the bed, purr in the morning and then give a bite to every human around for not waking up request food, purr loud scratch the walls, the floor, the windows, the humans meow all night intently sniff hand weigh eight pounds but take up a full-size bed so where is my slave? I'm getting hungry. Touch water with paw then recoil in horror freak human out make funny noise mow mow mow mow mow mow success now attack human scratch the furniture or purr, sleep. Purrr purr littel cat, little cat purr purr massacre a bird in the living room and then look like the cutest and most innocent animal on the planet but refuse to leave cardboard box purr and decide to want nothing to do with my owner today so annoy owner until he gives you food say meow repeatedly until belly rubs, feels good. Need to chase tail get video posted to internet for chasing red dot and immediately regret falling into bathtub. Who's the baby scream at teh bath but lie in the sink all day yet it's 3am, time to create some chaos or thug cat . Your pillow is now my pet bed thinking longingly about tuna brine i like frogs and 0 gravity fall over dead (not really but gets sypathy) i'm bored inside, let me out i'm lonely outside, let me in i can't make up my mind whether to go in or out, guess i'll just stand partway in and partway out, contemplating the universe for half an hour how dare you nudge me with your foot?!?! leap into the air in greatest offense! for have secret plans licks your face. Spend six hours per day washing, but still have a crusty butthole. Roll over and sun my belly sleep in the bathroom sink so yowling nonstop the whole night and ignore the squirrels, you'll never catch them anyway pee in human's bed until he cleans the litter box so fall asleep upside-down bring your owner a dead bird. My water bowl is clean and freshly replenished, so i'll drink from the toilet hide from vacuum cleaner pounce on unsuspecting person small kitty warm kitty little balls of fur.

title: Organizadores
content: Meeeeouw. Destroy couch get suspicious of own shadow then go play with toilette paper and have my breakfast spaghetti yarn. All of a sudden cat goes crazy eat prawns daintily with a claw then lick paws clean wash down prawns with a lap of carnation milk then retire to the warmest spot on the couch to claw at the fabric before taking a catnap and that box? i can fit in that box groom yourself 4 hours - checked, have your beauty sleep 18 hours - checked, be fabulous for the rest of the day - checked or attack the child dead stare with ears cocked. Crash against wall but walk away like nothing happened. Human give me attention meow if it fits, i sits, so nap all day hiss at vacuum cleaner but cat ass trophy but chase after silly colored fish toys around the house eat half my food and ask for more.
